item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Tony Kushner
item.description: "Don't be afraid; people are so afraid; don't be afraid to live in the raw wind, naked, alone...Learn at least this: What you are capable of. Let nothing stand in your way." -- Tony Kushner

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "And I knew that there was some dark corner of me that would enjoy using magic for killing—and then long for more. That was black magic, and it was easy to use. Easy and fun. Like Legos" -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Jonathan Cainer
item.description: "Why do we love the idea that people might be secretly working together to control and organise the world? Because we don't like to face the fact that our world runs on a combination of chaos, incompetence and confusion." -- Jonathan Cainer

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "Ignoring isn’t the same as ignorance, you have to work at it." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "The last clear definite function of men—muscles aching to work, minds aching to create beyond the single need—this is man." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Charles Dickens
item.description: "It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness, it was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity, it was the season of light, it was the season of darkness, it was the spring of hope, it was the winter of despair." -- Charles Dickens

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Lia Habel
item.description: "Real ladies can give orders, Real gentlemen can take them, and Real zombies don’t eat brains." -- Lia Habel

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Tara Sivec
item.description: "And let’s face it people, no one is ever honest with you about child birth. Not even your mother. “It’s a pain you forget all about once you have that sweet little baby in your arms.” Bullshit. I CALL BULLSHIT. Any friend, cousin, or nosey-ass stranger in the grocery store that tells you it’s not that bad is a lying sack of shit. Your vagina is roughly the size of the girth of a penis. It has to stretch and open andturn into a giant bat cave so the life-sucking human you’ve been growing for nine months can angrily claw its way out. Who in their right mind would do that willingly? You’re just walking along one day and think to yourself, “You know, I think it’s time I turn my vagina into an Arby’s Beef and Cheddar (minus the cheddar) and saddle myself down for a minimum of eighteen years to someone who will suck the soul and the will to live right out of my body so I’m a shell of the person I used to be and can’t get laid even if I pay for it." -- Tara Sivec

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by H.P. Lovecraft
item.description: "From even the greatest of horrors irony is seldom absent." -- H.P. Lovecraft

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Cassandra Clare
item.description: "I've got a stele we can use. Who wants to do me?" "A regrettable choice of words," muttered Magnus." -- Cassandra Clare

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Beck Sherman
item.description: "A long time ago, the act of another put the dark in his veins, and it's been there ever since. The night he lost his true love, his heart and his brain became one, so that his heart was scheming and his brain was loving. 'That doesn't sound so bad', my dream-self thought, but suddenly I could feel it, and it was very bad indeed—for when a brain loves, it is only out of obsession, and when a heart schemes, it does not mean well." -- Beck Sherman

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Gore Vidal
item.description: "The unfed mind devours itself." -- Gore Vidal

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Cassandra Rose Clarke
item.description: "She moved like water, graceful and soft and lovely. Every part of me wanted to stick out my foot and trip her, just to see her stumble." -- Cassandra Rose Clarke

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Rita Mae Brown
item.description: "Sorrow is how we learn to love. Your heart isn't breaking. It hurts because it's getting larger. The larger it gets, the more love it holds." -- Rita Mae Brown

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Bill Bryson
item.description: "Not one of your pertinent ancestors was squashed, devoured, drowned, starved, stranded, stuck fast, untimely wounded, or otherwise deflected from its life's quest of delivering a tiny charge of genetic material to the right partner at the right moment in order to perpetuate the only possible sequence of hereditary combinations that could result -- eventually, astoundingly, and all too briefly -- in you." -- Bill Bryson

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Sylvia Plath
item.description: "Dying is an art. Like everything else, I do it exceptionally well. I do it so it feels like hell. I do it so it feels real. I guess you could say I have a call." -- Sylvia Plath

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "Ankh-Morpork had dallied with many forms of government and had ended up with that form of democracy known as One Man, One Vote. The Patrician was the Man; he had the Vote." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Laini Taylor
item.description:
"Once upon a time, a little girl was raised by monsters.
But angels burned the doorways to their world, and she was all alone." -- Laini Taylor

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Amelia Earhart
item.description: "Adventure is worthwhile in itself." -- Amelia Earhart

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Lois McMaster Bujold
item.description: "Reputation is what other people know about you. Honor is what you know about yourself." -- Lois McMaster Bujold

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Michael Dobbs
item.description: "His deepest need was that people should like him. An admirable trait that; in a spaniel. Or a whore." -- Michael Dobbs

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "When all else fails, give up and go to the library." -- Stephen King

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Stephen King
item.description:
"Yeah, but what if you went back and killed your own grandfather?"
He stared at me, baffled. "Why the fuck would you do that?" -- Stephen King

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Seanan McGuire
item.description: "The laws of physics have already been violated. What happens if they decide to press charges?" -- Seanan McGuire

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "If you don't have time to read, you don't have the time (or the tools) to write. Simple as that." -- Stephen King

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Charles Stross
item.description: "Gene police! You! Out of the pool, now!" -- Charles Stross

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Tom Hiddleston
item.description: "Every villain is a hero in his own mind." -- Tom Hiddleston

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "He had heard about talking to plants in the early seventies, on Radio Four, and thought it was an excellent idea. Although talking is perhaps the wrong word for what Crowley did. What he did was put the fear of God into them. More precisely, the fear of Crowley. In addition to which, every couple of months Crowley would pick out a plant that was growing too slowly, or succumbing to leaf-wilt or browning, or just didn't look quite as good as the others, and he would carry it around to all the other plants. "Say goodbye to your friend," he'd say to them. "He just couldn't cut it. . . " Then he would leave the flat with the offending plant, and return an hour or so later with a large, empty flower pot, which he would leave somewhere conspicuously around the flat. The plants were the most luxurious, verdant, and beautiful in London. Also the most terrified." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Frank Herbert
item.description: "I must not fear. Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. And when it has gone past I will turn the inner eye to see its path. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain." -- Frank Herbert

item.title: Yzabel add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "I'm so pretty, it's hard for me to think of myself as intelligent." -- Jim Butcher
